author: Paul Kasabian
title: Santa Clara Executive Officer: 'We'd Be Lucky' to Have Sports by Thanksgiving
description: Dr. Jeffrey Smith, who is the executive officer for Santa Clara County (California), told the county's Board of Supervisors that he doesn't foresee " any sports games until at least Thanksgiving" and that "we'd be lucky to have them by Thanksgiving...
content:
Jeff Chiu/Associated Press
Dr. Jeffrey Smith, who is the executive officer for Santa Clara County (California), told the county's Board of Supervisors that he doesn't foresee "any sports games until at least Thanksgiving" and that "we'd be lucky to have them… [+974 chars]
